name: The grey path
description:
The grey path is a platformer game based in the colors white and black, this game, has bossfights and levels to pass

Avoid obstacles, get coins and defeat enemies to reach the levels as fast as you can!

It contains:

  • 12 levels
  • 3 bossfight levels
  • 1 secret level
  • 4 skins

Follow me on itch.io:

https://gold356.itch.io

Windows version early may 2021.
